changelog.change: [Fix] Images of personal parent album are counted doubled on CleanUp
[Fix] Views from image_page.php are not counting correctly (Bug #548)
[Fix] Shortend albumname is not viewed in full length on hover (Bug #555)
[Fix] "undefined index" when album was deleted and user is viewed as visiting on viewonline (Bug #553)
[Fix] Error while converting: Duplicate entry 'newest pgallery_user_color' for Key 1 (Bug #552)
[Fix] Image gets removed from user-favorites when only having user-permissions or when image is in a personal albums (Bug #556)
[Fix] White page on uploading, when exif is not installed on the server (Bug #551)
[Fix] Cannot redeclare user_get_id_name() when guests upload or comment (Bug #550)
[Fix] PHP Notice: in file /gallery/includes/functions_recent.php on line 314: Division by zero (Bug #549)
[Change] Move image-description into seperated block for style line
[Feature] [url][img]-BBCode on image_page.php for posting in other forums
[Feature] View an image with the error message instead of trigger_error (Bug #554)

Leere den Cache im "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Allgemein" > "Den Cache leeren"
